origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAPI.get_patent_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves the patent data for a specified company and its competitors in a given technology area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The technology area, e.g., 5G, AI, IoT.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of competitor companies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'competitor_patent_data', 'description': 'The patent data for the specified company and its competitors in the given technology area.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，获取华为公司的主要竞争对手的5G专利数据。
